name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Track
description: This is a repository of track APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: SoundCloud
apis.description: SoundCloud is a music and podcast streaming platform that lets you listen to millions of songs from around the world, or upload your own. Start listening now!

apis.name: 7digital
apis.description: Welcome to 7digital!    Choose from over 30 million high quality tracks in our store; download, sync and play your music on the go.

apis.name: Sendible
apis.description: Sendible is a social media management tool that helps agencies and companies boost their productivity on social media. Try it for free.

apis.name: Atlassian
apis.description: Millions of users globally rely on Atlassian products every day for improving software development, project management, collaboration, and code quality.

apis.name: Spotify
apis.description: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs.

apis.name: Microsoft Graph
apis.description: Microsoft Graph exposes multiple APIs from Office 365 and other Microsoft cloud services through a single endpoint: https://graph.microsoft.com. Microsoft Graph simplifies queries that would otherwise be more complex. You can use Microsoft Graph to: Access data from multiple Microsoft cloud services, including Azure Active Directory, Exchange Online as part of Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive, OneNote, and Planner. Navigate between entities and relationships. Access intelligence and insights from the Microsoft cloud (for commercial users).

apis.name: Docsmore
apis.description: FORM.FILL.SIGN - With Docsmore, the process of setting up a form and sending to users to complete or sign is simplified.  Use our platform to easily upload a document, specify form fields/signage, and send to users for completion.  Present forms to you...
